# Raw data 

```{r}
deaths <- read_rds("data/BAG-open/deaths.rds") %>% 
  mutate(weekend = chron::is.weekend(datum))
```

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
# 2020 only if needed
deaths %>% 
  filter(datum <= ymd("2020-12-31")) %>% 
  summarise(deaths = sum(entries))
```


```{r echo=FALSE, layout="l-body-outset"}
deaths %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = datum)) + 
  geom_col(aes(y = entries), alpha = 5/10, linetype = 0) + 
  # geom_line(aes(y = mean7d), color = "red") + 
  xlab("") + ylab("Deaths") + theme_bw()
```

```{r echo=FALSE, layout="l-body-outset"}
deaths %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = datum)) + 
  geom_col(aes(y = sumTotal), alpha = 5/10, linetype = 0) + 
  xlab("") + ylab("Cumulative deaths") + theme_bw()
```
